main event: An unidentified flying object was observed hovering over Coraopolis, Pennsylvania, estimated to be at a 2000 ft altitude with two red lights.
interesting points: The sighting took place during an auroral display, which may have contributed to optical illusions,The object was estimated to have a diameter of 50-80 ft,The observer was a secretary from the 94th Fighter Group,The radar station failed to track the object, yet it was reported by individuals from a nearby missile battalion, The object was described as circular and not resembling conventional aircraft.
sighted object: unidentified flying object with two red lights
